overview: Nefarious villain Goldginger (Fernando Rey) is thwarted by bumbling secret agents Franco (Franco Franchi) and Ciccio (Ciccio Ingrassia) in his scheme to spark an international war by zombifying all government employees in this Italian spoof of the James Bond movies.
tagline: GOLDGINGER Is Up To His Tricks, What Evil Lurks In His Mind Now?
title: The Amazing Doctor G
